channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MS
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MS

item.title: Report X-2023101379
item.description:
Report X-2023101379

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-21T18:13:39+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-18
  • City: OLIVE BRANCH
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2023101379 SequenceEvent: The package was being unloaded by a member of hub management as I was processing other Grainger hazmat packages as I continued processing packages the manager in question threw the package onto the floor causing spillage. He continued to throw other hazmat packages onto the floor causing another package to become damaged. DescribePack: Bottom portion of the package, small dent and therefore a hole that leaked outward. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was immediately put into a container to conceal further spillage of the package. 2.X-2023101382 SequenceEvent: Packages were unloaded improperly by member of hub management. Against my telling him not to, he continued to throw packages onto the floor. I immediately took the damaged hazmat package and put it into a hazmat drum to prevent further spillage. DescribePack: Bottom of box was dented and caused leakage. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: I put the package into a yellow hazmat drum and cleaned the area.

item.title: Report X-2023101338
item.description:
Report X-2023101338

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-21T18:13:39+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-17
  • City: OLIVE BRANCH
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was unloaded by PHs and the package handler did not have a good grip on the package and it dropped and immediately started to spill, I safely grabbed the package and put it inside a hazmat drum to prevent further spillage. DescribePack: Top right side by the cap was burst as well as the bottom of the canister. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: I cleaned it up immediately.
